mapper.select: SELECT COMMENT_NUM, COMMENT_AUTHOR, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_DATE, MEMBER_NUM, ARTICLE_NUM FROM COMMENTS WHERE ARTICLE_NUM = #{articleNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS (COMMENT_AUTHOR, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_DATE, MEMBER_NUM, ARTICLE_NUM) VALUES (#{commentAuthor}, #{commentContent}, NOW(), #{memberNum}, #{articleNum})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMMENTS WHERE COMMENT_NUM = #{commentNum} AND MEMBER_NUM = #{memberNum}
